title: Software Modeling PBL-Based Educational Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Formative assessment-driven collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners independently analyze software modeling problems from real-world industrial contexts using a PBL approach and design at least three types of UML diagrams.
Learners incorporate peer feedback into modeling solution development at a rate of 80% or higher using a group collaboration system.
Learners diagnose their own modeling outputs at three competency levels (basic/intermediate/advanced) using a self-assessment rubric.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
